publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 16
ab.l: Abajly miźmor David́niń saqlaɣyn ḿeni e Teńri ki išanamyn saja.
Ajtamyn H-ɣa Teńrim śeń jaḥšy et́ḿa maja borč t́u- v́uĺd́ur saja.
Aziźĺar üč́uń ki jerd́a alar da ḱuč́ĺuĺard́a bar kĺagim alarda.

Artḥejlar qyjynlary alarnyn kimĺar öźǵa Teńriǵa
qalyn b́eŕadirĺar qujmagejmyn qujmaḥlaryn alarnyn qandan da almagejmyn š́emĺa- riń alarnyn erińĺarim üśt́uńa.
H tijiši üĺuš́umńuń da qovušum śeń kiplejsiń ɣoralymny.
Üĺušĺar t́ušt́uĺar üś- t́uḿa č́eb́arlikĺar byla hem üĺuš́um č́eb́ar boldu maja.
Maḥtav b́eŕamiń H-ɣa ki jaḥšy keńaš́ keńaš́ et́ti maja hem keč́aĺar byla had́epĺadiĺar ḿeni b́uv́ŕakĺarim.
Qojamyn bolušluɣun H-nyn qaršy- ma hamḿeš́a ki bolsa on janymdan tajmammyn.
Anyn üč́uń bijańa- dir juŕagim da quvanadyr syjly ǯanym hem gufum toḥtar emińlik byla.
Ki kemišḿadij ǯanymny ǵorǵa b́ermejsiń ḥasid́ kišija ḱorḿa ǯuɣurnu.
Biĺdirgiń maja iziń t́erlikniń tojma bijańč́ĺard́ań qybla- laryj alnyna č́eb́arlikĺarińd́ań on qudratyjnyn öḿurǵa dejiń.
